summary: "Pulp Fiction" is a 1994 American crime movie written and directed by Quentin Tarantino. It tells four connected stories about crime in Los Angeles and is known for its violent scenes and interesting conversations between characters. The movie stars John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, and Uma Thurman. It was a big success, winning awards and making Travolta popular again. Many people think it's Tarantino's best work and an important movie in film history.
title: Pulp Fiction
